data.text: Mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi.
Mumtogole hemwe mlingikala kuli ng'handa ya Mkulu Nguluwi,
Mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi kwa vila ka yanojile,
Mkulu Nguluwi nakamhagula Yakobo yawe wa heye,
Ndikomya, ndivizela kota Mkulu Nguluwi ndo mkulu,
Mkulu Nguluwi kanguditaga choneche choyalingugana,
Ndo yalingigala ng'hungugu kulawa kuli mbaka ja isi,
Ndo yawakopole walelwa wa mwaluko ako Misili,
Ndo yaditile ulajilo na kububuwaza kwa hegwe, gwa Misili,
Ndo yawadumye wanhu wa isi nyinji,
wawele ndo Sihoni mndewa wa Waamoli,
Nakahola isi za hewo na kuwapa wanhu wa heye,
Itagwa lya hegwe, gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, lyangikala mazuwa gose,
Mkulu Nguluwi kowalewela wanhu wa heye,
Jimalukolo ja wanhu wa isi ndo sendi na zahabu,
Jina milomo, ila hajilingulonga,
Jina makutu, ila hajilinguhulika,
Weng'ha walingujigongomanya wochiwhana najo,
Hemwe wanhu wa Isilaeli, mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi.
Hemwe Walawi, mumtogole Mkulu Nguluwi.
Yatogoligwe Mkulu Nguluwi kuli Siyoni,
